text: Patrick McCluskey (13 April 1952 – 24 August 2020) was a Scottish footballer. In 1970, McCluskey began his professional career with Celtic. However, he went on loan that first season to Sligo Rovers in Ireland.Pat McCluskey: Huge impact during short spell at the Showgrounds, The Sligo Champion, 29 October 2003 [accompanying image shows George McCluskey]Celtic player McCluskey, Pat, FitbaStats He moved to second-tier Dumbarton in 1977 for £15,000, where he spent three seasons.Pat McCluskey player profile , Sons Archive ==References== ==Other websites== *MISL stats *McCluskey, Pat, The Celtic Wiki Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from North Lanarkshire
title: Pat McCluskey
